1101010010101001 0110100010110010 1 -> sum: 0011110101011100, cout: 1
0011011101111110 0100110110100000 0 -> sum: 1000010100011110, cout: 0
1011100000111100 1101111111101111 0 -> sum: 1001100000101011, cout: 1

0000000010110101 0001110101011011 1 -> sum: 0001111000010001, cout: 0
1010100010111011 0101011100001101 1 -> sum: 1111111111001001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
